H0.text: At which Winter Olympic host city would you find the Cresta Run. Innsbruck

H1.text: At which Winter Olympic host city would you find the Cresta Run. Lake Placid

H2.text: At which Winter Olympic host city would you find the Cresta Run. Chamonix

H3.text: At which Winter Olympic host city would you find the Cresta Run. St-Moritz

A4.text: The Cresta Run is located in the winter sports town of St. Moritz.

A5.text: The track was used for the skeleton event in both the 1928 and the 1948 Winter Olympics.
